sentences.en: Dustpan Baojing County is located in rural south - west of Central, 35 km from the county seat.
sentences.cn: 簸箕乡位于保靖县西南中部, 距县城35千米.

sentences.en: Have you got a dustpan and brush?
Hence, two people of brothers take broom and dustpan, arriving veranda uping to sweep sunlight.
sentences.cn: 于是, 兄弟两人拿着扫帚和畚箕, 到阳台上去扫阳光.

sentences.en: Sweep the melon - seed shells into a dustpan.
sentences.cn: 把瓜子壳胡噜到簸箕里.

sentences.en: The distribution of the system is not mainly controlled by the local dustpan - like sags.
sentences.cn: 河湖体系的分布不受局部箕 状 凹陷所控制.

sentences.en: Thus, the two brothers with a broom and dustpan to sweep up the sun terrace.
sentences.cn: 于是他们拿着扫帚和簸箕去清扫阳光.

trans.tran_en: a flat container with a handle that you use with a brush to remove dust and waste from the floor
